[Groovy] Class ConfigurableScreenshotExtensionFactory

java.lang.Object
  es.osoco.grails.plugins.concordion.extensions.ConfigurableExtensionFactory
      ConfigurableScreenshotExtensionFactory

class ConfigurableScreenshotExtensionFactory
extends ConfigurableExtensionFactory

This class implements the org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtensionFactory interface to create a org.concordion.api.extension.ScreenshotExtension following the configuration values specified in the Grails application's Config.groovy. By default, this factory creates an extension that will add screenshots to the output whenever an assertion fails, or an uncaught Throwable occurs in the test.

Authors:
Rafael Luque

getConfigurationBlockName

static java.lang.String getConfigurationBlockName()

maxWidth

void maxWidth(int maxWidth)
Sets the maximum width that will be used for display of the images in the output.

screenshotOnAssertionFailure

void screenshotOnAssertionFailure(boolean takeShot)
Sets whether screenshots will be embedded in the output when assertions fail. Defaults to true.
Parameters:
takeShot - true to take screenshots on assertion failures, false to not take screenshots.

screenshotOnAssertionSuccess

void screenshotOnAssertionSuccess(boolean takeShot)
Sets whether screenshots will be embedded in the output when assertions pass. Defaults to false.
Parameters:
takeShot - true to take screenshots on assertion success, false to not take screenshots.

screenshotOnThrowable

void screenshotOnThrowable(boolean takeShot)
Sets whether screenshots will be embedded in the output when uncaught Throwables occur in the test. Defaults to true.
Parameters:
takeShot - true to take screenshots on uncaught Throwables, false to not take screenshots.

screenshotTaker

void screenshotTaker(org.concordion.ext.ScreenshotTaker screenshotTaker)
Set a custom screenshot taker. If not set, the extension will default to using Robot which will take a shot of the full visible screen.
Parameters:
screenshotTaker
